job.title: Principal Scientist / Associate Director, Molecular Biology
job.description: We invent and create multi domain proteins for cell and gene therapies (including genome editors and CARs). By coupling synthetic biology with data science and machine learning, we are able to generate high-scale protein libraries for high-throughput screening and analysis!  This position is based in San Francisco, CA. We are actively looking to hire a Principal Scientist / Associate Director, Molecular Biology! This person will help contribute towards building out and deploying our high-throughput methods to characterize and develop cutting edge therapies for immuno-oncology.  Top Reasons to Work with Us What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Principal Scientist / Associate Director, Molecular Biology with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Sean.Jenkins@cybercoders.com Sean Jenkins - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
